description: The specimen analyzed. The current value set is taken from the SNOMED CT Body substance sample (specimen) hierarchy. The local (UI) display term is the Snomed preferred term without the word 'specimen'. More values will be added as needed.
name: specimen-source
title: OMH to FHIR Specimen Source ValueSet
